sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: NET Power (NYSE: NPWR) insiders report 22.25% stake and recent share sales
feed.summary: An insider group, including 8 Rivers Capital, NPEH, Damian Beauchamp, and 8RCH, holds a 22.25% beneficial ownership of NET Power (NYSE: NPWR) Class A common stock, totaling 23,279,880 shares. This ownership includes shares directly held and those issuable upon exchange of Opco Units. Between November 17, 2025, and December 9, 2025, NPEH also sold 1,288,653 shares of its Class A common stock.

feed.title: NET Power (NPWR) 10% owner reports 40,000-share stock sale
feed.summary: A 10% owner of NET Power Inc. (NPWR) reported selling 40,000 shares of its Class A common stock on December 9, 2025, at a weighted average price of $2.8235 per share. After this transaction, the reporting person beneficially owned 2,550,000 shares. The sale was disclosed in an SEC Form 4 filing, indicating multiple trades between $2.80 and $2.855 per share.

feed.title: NET Power Insider Sells Shares
feed.summary: NPEH, LLC, a 10% owner and director of NET Power, sold 310,000 shares of Class A Common Stock across three transactions on December 4, 5, and 8, 2025, for a total of $889,702. The sales were executed at weighted average prices between $2.8091 and $2.9424. Following these transactions, NPEH, LLC directly holds 2,590,000 shares of NET Power's Class A Common Stock.

feed.title: NET Power Inc. Shareholders Who Lost Money on Their Investment are Encouraged to Contact Johnson Fistel about the Class Action Lawsuit
feed.summary: Johnson Fistel, PLLP has announced a class action lawsuit against NET Power Inc. (NYSE: NPWR) for investors who purchased securities between June 9, 2023, and March 7, 2025. The lawsuit alleges that NET Power made false and misleading statements regarding the Project Permian's timeline and cost due to supply chain issues and site-specific challenges. Investors who suffered significant losses are encouraged to contact Johnson Fistel to serve as lead plaintiff by June 17, 2025.

feed.title: Class Action Filed Against NET Power, Inc. (NPWR) Over Securities Violations - Contact Levi & Korsinsky Today
feed.summary: A class action lawsuit has been filed against NET Power, Inc. (NYSE: NPWR) alleging securities fraud between June 9, 2023, and March 7, 2025. The lawsuit claims that the company made false statements regarding the timeline and cost of its Project Permian, which was significantly underestimated due to supply chain issues and site-specific challenges. Shareholders who suffered losses during this period are encouraged to contact Levi & Korsinsky, LLP for information about their rights.

feed.title: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. Reminds Investors That Class Action Lawsuits Have Been Filed Against Ibotta, NET Power, Zenas BioPharma, and BigBear and Encourages Investors to Contact the Firm
feed.summary: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C., a shareholder rights law firm, reminds investors that class action lawsuits have been filed against Ibotta, Inc., NET Power, Inc., Zenas BioPharma, Inc., and BigBear.ai Holdings, Inc. Investors in these companies have upcoming deadlines to petition the court to serve as lead plaintiff. The lawsuits allege false and/or misleading statements and omissions in registration statements or public disclosures regarding each company's business operations and financial prospects.

feed.title: Join Class Action to Recover Losses from NET Power, Inc. (NPWR) - Contact Levi & Korsinsky Before June 17, 2025
feed.summary: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP has filed a class action securities lawsuit against NET Power, Inc. (NYSE: NPWR) on behalf of shareholders who suffered losses between June 9, 2023, and March 7, 2025. The lawsuit alleges that Net Power made false statements regarding the schedule and costs of its Project Permian, leading to unrealistic projections and a negative impact on the company's financial results. Affected shareholders are encouraged to contact Levi & Korsinsky before June 17, 2025, to learn about their rights.

feed.title: Net Power Inc. ten percent owners sell $387,919 in stock
feed.summary: Two ten percent owners of NET Power Inc. (NASDAQ:NPWR), 8 Rivers Capital, LLC and Damian R. Beauchamp, sold a total of $387,919 in Class A Common Stock on November 20 and 21, 2025. Following these sales, they still retain 3,100,000 shares. This news comes after NET Power Inc. reported a significant third-quarter EPS loss of $5.28, missing forecasts, and announced a strategic pivot to post-combustion carbon capture technology.

feed.title: NPEH sells NET Power (NPWR) shares worth $387,919
feed.summary: NPEH, LLC, a ten percent owner of NET Power Inc. (NYSE:NPWR), sold 150,000 shares of Class A Common Stock for approximately $387,919 in two transactions on November 20 and 21, 2025. These sales occurred while NET Power's stock was trading at $2.52 and despite analysts' targets ranging from $3 to $17. The company recently reported a significant EPS loss for Q3 2025 but is strategically shifting towards post-combustion carbon capture technology.

feed.title: Net Power Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results and Provides Business Update
feed.summary: Net Power Inc. announced its Q3 2025 financial and operational results, shifting its strategy to prioritize clean power projects using gas turbines with post-combustion carbon capture (PCC) due to high demand for firm power solutions. The company signed a letter of intent with Entropy Inc. to exclusively deploy Entropy's PCC technology in the US and is advancing clean firm power hubs in West Texas and northern MISO, while continuing to develop its oxy-combustion technology. Net Power reported a strong financial position with $424 million in cash, cash equivalents, and investments but noted a non-cash impairment due to slower-than-anticipated acceptance of its oxy-combustion technology.

feed.title: Net Power Inc (NPWR) 8 Rivers Capital sells $107k in shares
feed.summary: 8 Rivers Capital, a significant owner in NET Power Inc (NASDAQ:NPWR), sold 26,593 shares of Class A Common Stock for approximately $107,347 in two separate transactions in late October and early November 2025. Despite recent volatility and an earnings miss, the company holds more cash than debt, and its next earnings report is scheduled for November 13.

feed.title: Net Power Inc. (NPWR) 10% owner sells shares worth $73,418
feed.summary: Cynda Beauchamp, a 10% owner of Net Power Inc. (NPWR), recently sold 18,116 shares for approximately $73,418. This transaction occurred amidst a significant 61.18% decline in NPWR stock over the past year and financial challenges for the company, including quickly burning through cash. The company also reported missing analysts' expectations for its Q2 2025 earnings, though after-hours trading saw a 7.06% increase in stock value.

feed.title: NPEH sells NET Power (NPWR) shares worth $1.68 million
feed.summary: NPEH, LLC, a significant owner of NET Power Inc. (NYSE:NPWR), sold 479,300 shares of Class A Common Stock for approximately $1.68 million between October 20 and October 22, 2025. These transactions occurred as NET Power's stock dropped 12% in the preceding week, with the company currently valued at $772 million. Analysts hold diverse views on NET Power's future, with price targets ranging from $2 to $17.

feed.title: NET Power (NYSE:NPWR) Stock Price Down 7.3% - Time to Sell? - MarketBeat
feed.summary: NET Power Inc. (NYSE:NPWR) experienced a 7.3% stock price drop on Thursday, with unusually low trading volume. The company has mixed analyst ratings (one Strong Buy, one Buy, two Sell) and a consensus "Hold" rating with a target price of $4.00, despite missing earnings estimates significantly for the last quarter. Hedge funds have shown varied activity in NPWR, with some increasing and some initiating positions, as the company operates as a clean energy technology firm.

feed.title: NPWR Form 4: 4,000,000 unit exchange, follow-on Class A sales - Stock Titan
feed.summary: NPEH, LLC, a 10% owner of NET Power Inc. (NPWR), exchanged 4,000,000 Class A Units for 4,000,000 Class A Common Stock shares on October 14, 2025, cancelling an equal number of Class B shares. Subsequently, NPEH sold Class A shares on October 15 and 16, 2025, at weighted average prices between $4.7061 and $4.8786. After these transactions, NPEH beneficially owned 3,763,400 Class A Common Stock shares, and the remaining Class B Common Stock balance was 22,729,880.

feed.title: Form 4: NPEH exchanges into Class A, holds 3,763,400 NPWR - Stock Titan
feed.summary: NPEH, LLC, an insider affiliate of NET Power Inc. (NPWR), exchanged 4,000,000 Class A Units for Class A Common Stock on October 14, 2025, simultaneously cancelling an equal number of Class B shares. Subsequently, NPEH sold 236,600 Class A shares between October 15-16, 2025, at weighted average prices ranging from $4.7061 to $4.8786. After these transactions, NPEH beneficially owns 3,763,400 Class A shares and retains 22,729,880 Class A Units of NET Power Operations LLC.

feed.title: Investor Alert: Deadline Approaching to Join NET Power, Inc. (NPWR) Class Action - Contact Levi & Korsinsky
feed.summary: Levi & Korsinsky is alerting investors of NET Power, Inc. (NPWR) about an approaching deadline to join a class action lawsuit. Shareholders who suffered losses due to alleged securities fraud between June 9, 2023, and March 7, 2025, are encouraged to seek potential recovery. The lawsuit claims that NET Power made false statements regarding the schedule and costs of its Project Permian, which negatively impacted the Company's business and financial results.

feed.title: Class Action Lawsuit Alert: Levi & Korsinsky Reminds NET Power, Inc. (NPWR) Investors of June 17, 2025 Deadline
feed.summary: Levi & Korsinsky LLP reminds investors of NET Power, Inc. (NYSE: NPWR) that a class action lawsuit has been filed, alleging securities fraud between June 9, 2023, and March 7, 2025. The lawsuit claims NET Power made false statements regarding the schedule and costs of its "Project Permian," leading to investor losses. Investors who suffered losses are encouraged to learn about their rights to seek recovery by the June 17, 2025 deadline.

feed.title: Lost Money on NET Power, Inc. (NPWR)? Join Class Action Suit Seeking Recovery – Contact Levi & Korsinsky
feed.summary: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP has filed a class action securities lawsuit against NET Power, Inc. (NPWR) on behalf of investors who suffered losses between June 9, 2023, and March 7, 2025. The lawsuit alleges that NET Power made false statements and concealed issues regarding the Project Permian, including expected delays and increased costs. Investors affected by these issues are encouraged to join the suit, with a lead plaintiff deadline of June 17, 2025.

feed.title: NPWR STOCKHOLDERS: Contact Robbins LLP for information About How to Lead the Class Action Against NET Power Inc.

feed.title: Deadline Alert: NET Power Inc. (NPWR) Investors Who Lost Money Urged To Contact Glancy Prongay & Murray LLP About Securities Fraud Lawsuit
feed.summary: Glancy Prongay & Murray LLP reminds investors of the June 17, 2025 deadline to file a lead plaintiff motion in a class action lawsuit against NET Power Inc. (NPWR). The lawsuit alleges that Net Power made misleading statements regarding the Project Permian completion schedule and costs, which led to significant stock price drops and investor losses. Investors who purchased shares between June 9, 2023, and March 7, 2025, are encouraged to contact the law firm to learn about their rights to recover losses.

feed.title: Shareholders that lost money on NET Power, Inc.(NPWR) Urged to Join Class Action - Contact The Gross Law Firm to Learn More

(NYSE: NPWR) encouraging those who purchased shares between June 9, 2023, and March 7, 2025, to join a class action lawsuit. The complaint alleges that NET Power made materially false and misleading statements regarding the timeline and cost of its Project Permian, which was likely to be significantly more expensive and delayed. Shareholders have until June 17, 2025, to seek appointment as lead plaintiff.

feed.title: NET POWER INC. (NYSE: NPWR) INVESTOR ALERT: Investors With
feed.summary: Bernstein Liebhard LLP has announced a securities class action lawsuit against NET Power Inc. (NYSE: NPWR) on behalf of investors who purchased securities between June 9, 2023, and March 7, 2025. The lawsuit alleges that the company made misrepresentations regarding the timely completion of its Project Permian. feed.title: NPEH, LLC sells shares of NET Power Inc. worth over $285k
feed.summary: NPEH, LLC, a major shareholder in NET Power Inc. (NYSE:NPWR), sold over $285,000 worth of shares in September across several transactions, reducing its holding to 67,445 Class A Common Stock shares. Concurrently, NET Power faces financial challenges including negative gross profit margins and stock price volatility, despite holding more cash than debt. The company is advancing its clean power technology with Project Permian and strategic partnerships, aiming for a Levelized Cost of Electricity of $60 per megawatt hour.
